instruction: Evaluate your current climate investment portfolio and identify the key attributes and metrics that are of particular interest to you. Manage your portfolio accordingly to align with your climate objectives.
output: As an AI language model, I do not have a climate investment portfolio, however, based on your instruction, I recommend that you evaluate your current portfolio by assessing the level of risk, return, active share and tracking error. With a focus on achieving specific climate objectives, identify the key attributes and metrics that are most important to you and manage your portfolio accordingly. Be sure to keep up-to-date with the climate investment ecosystem to ensure your portfolio remains aligned with your objectives.
